mapper.delete: delete from favorite where user_id=#{userId} and dongCode=#{dongCode}
mapper.select: select d.sidoName sidoName, d.gugunName gugunName, hi.dong dongName, hi.apartmentName aptName, hd.dealYear dealYear, hd.dealAmount dealAmount from houseinfo hi inner join housedeal hd on hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode inner join dongcode d on hi.dong = d.dongName where d.sidoName = #{sidoName} and d.gugunName = #{gugunName} and hi.dong=#{dongName};
select sidoName, gugunName, dongName from dongcode where dongCode=#{dongCode}
